Title: Requires NYCHA to provide information and trainings to residents regarding resident management corporations
Summary: Requires NYCHA to provide information and trainings to all residents regarding resident management corporations; requires DHCA to provide funds to NYCHA to implement the program.
LawCode: Add ยง402-h, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to providing trainings and information to residents regarding resident management corporations
